name: Kick-off Plan
description: Perfect if you have in-house tech folks that can implement the automation plan I give you.
features: This plan includes 8 hours of observation and planning together (typically 4 x 2hr blocks)
I'll meet with 1-3 key team members to understand your workflows and identify automation opportunities
From these sessions, I'll create an actionable automation plan
The plan will contain full implementation options that you can easily implement yourself
We'll have a 1.5 hour wrap-up meeting to review the plan together

name: Full Implementation
description: If you want me to fully implement the automation plan too. Everything in the Kick-off plan, and:
features: If you choose full implementation at the start, I'll give you a 50% discount on the Kick-off plan
I'll implement agreed parts or all of the automation for you for an agreed rate
The automation plan will include a proposed timeline for implementation that we can discuss and agree on
My solutions are easily adaptable and extendable, and low-code
My solutions can be easily plugged into third-party tools and products
